TopicTitle: How hard is it to make our current SP-4 solar panels longer?

Articles.Content:
E = Panel

Instead of EEEEEE

How hard would it be to make it EEEEEEEEEEEE?

it would be ALOT of work,

since we can't convert the .mu models back, the model would have to be completely redone.

even if we could convert the model back it would still be ALOT of work. the models would have to be extended and all the animations redone.

so either way it would be easier to start from scratch
